message: I thought intensity was MIT/X11. Wouldn't this also apply to the Cc stuff since it's based off of Intensity?

Apparently, it applies to these files at the very least:

src/intensity/intensity_physics.h
src/intensity/shared_module_members.boost
src/intensity/intensity_physics_sauer.h
src/intensity/messages.template
It is, it was re-licensed by Kripken and apparently some headers were missed. Ref: http://syntensity.blogspot.com/2010/04/new-license-mit.html
